entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
